Table of Contents

Interface ICRUDService<T>

Namespace
MdFilesMerger.App.Abstract
Assembly
MdFilesMerger.App.dll

Interface with base CRUD functionalities to serve stored private collection of IItem objects.

Inheritance: IService<T> -> ICRUDService<T>
Implementations: BaseDirectoryService<T>, BaseService<T>, RelativeFileService<T>, IgnoredFileService, MainDirectoryService, MergedFileService, SelectedFileService, UserService 

public interface ICRUDService<T> : IService<T> where T : IItem

Type Parameters

T

Type of handled entity.

Inherited Members
IService<T>.ReadById(int)

Methods

Create(T)

Adds the item to the stored collection.

int Create(T item)

Parameters

item T

The item to add.

Returns

int

Identification number of added item. It can be:

  • item.Id, if it is greater than 0 and there was no equal element or element with the same id in the collection,
  • new identification number (one grater than max id value in the collection), if there is no equal element in the collection, but there is already element with this id or value of item.Id is less equal 0,
  • -1, if item wasn't added to the collection (for example item was null or there already is equal item in the collection).

Delete(int)

Deletes the item with the specified identification number.

int Delete(int id)

Parameters

id int

The identification number of the item to removed.

Returns

int

Identification number of removed item or -1, if item wasn't removed, also if there is no element with identification number id in the stored collection.

GetNewId()

Gets the identification number for new element.

int GetNewId()

Returns

int

Returns number one greater then max Id in the stored collection, or 1, if list is empty.

IItem

Update(T)

Updates the specified item.

int Update(T item)

Parameters

item T

The updated item.

Returns

int

Identification number of updated item or -1, if there is no element with id item.Id in the stored collection, old value wasn't successfully removed or there is already equal object in the collection.

Remarks

First method removes from the collection element with the same identification number. If removal succeeded, calls Create( item) method. If item wasn't successfully added to the collection, previous object is restored.
